name: Australis 2.0 [Developer Edition - Dark]
description: A Firefox userstyle that makes minor theme changes throughout the UI using the Mozilla's Australis design guidelines for consistency. This is a fork of Blinky's "Firefox Australis Windows 8 Appearance" (https://userstyles.org/styles/96014/firefox-australis-windows-8-appearance). All credit goes to him first! This theme is only optimized for Windows, specifically the Developer Edition build (DARK ONLY). Restart the browser to see complete changes. Light theme coming soon. Other styles created: Australis 2.0 https://userstyles.org/styles/134338/australis-2-0-beta Australis 2.0 [Android Edition] TBA
additional_info: Release notes: 1.0 - First public release Known bugs: 1) Item highlighting styling (tree/moz-tree/tree children) appears to be broken as of August 30, 2016 for Bookmarks/History Library, about:preferences, and the Page Info window. To redefine code. 2) The downloads panel styles may need to be redone to match current specs. 3) Bookmarks panel x-icon color needs to be inverted. 4) As of version Firefox v.51, Control Center icon colors on the URL bar are not inverted. This is an issue that Mozilla is (I hope) currently working on in its default theme.
